status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d57hj","text":"To purify NAP1 or GST-NAP1, synthesize or clone human NAP1 cDNA in a pGEX-4T1 vector with an N-terminal GST tag followed by a TEV cleavage site (RRID:Addgene_208870).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ekr22","text":"For expression of GST-TEV-NAP1 in E. coli, transform the pGEX-4T1 vector encoding GST-TEV-NAP1 into E. coli Rosetta pLySS cells. Grow the cells in 2xTY medium at   until an OD600 of 0.4 and then continue at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":34,"length":7},{"style":"italic","offset":100,"length":7},{"style":"sub","offset":175,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":162,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":207,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c74m9","text":"Once the cells reached an OD600 of 0.8, induce protein expression with   IPTG for   at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":28,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":82,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":87,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1j1n","text":"Collect the cells by centrifugation and resuspend it in lysis buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"csm1j","text":"Lysis buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"366bd","text":"      Tris-HCl pH 7.4  50 mM    NaCl   300 mM    DTT   1 mM    MgCl2   2 mM    glycerol  5%    β-mercaptoethanol   2 mM     cOmplete EDTA-free protease inhibitors\n  (Roche)     DNase (Sigma)  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":192}],"data":{}},{"key":"e0vih","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","6_0":"","7_0":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["352","95"],"data":[["Tris-HCl pH 7.4","50 mM"],["NaCl","300 mM"],["DTT","1 mM"],["MgCl\u003csub\u003e2\u003c/sub\u003e","2 mM"],["glycerol","5%"],["β-mercaptoethanol","2 mM"],["cOmplete EDTA-free protease inhibitors (Roche)",""],["\u0026nbsp;DNase (Sigma)",""]],"guid":"91F14CFD320C43EC81251D63F4E0D86C","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Tris-HCl pH 7.4","50 mM"],["NaCl","300 mM"],["DTT","1 mM"],["MgCl\u003csub\u003e2\u003c/sub\u003e","2 mM"],["glycerol","5%"],["β-mercaptoethanol","2 mM"],["cOmplete EDTA-free protease inhibitors (Roche)",""],["\u0026nbsp;DNase (Sigma)",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eq2o","text":"Clear the lysates by centrifugation at   in a SORVAL RC6+ centrifuge with an F21S-8x50Y rotor (Thermo Scientific). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e3t4f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"18000","duration":2700,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"526s8","text":"Collect and incubate the supernatant with pre-equilibrated Glutathione Sepharose 4B beads (GE Healthcare) for   at   with gentle shaking to bind GST-TEV-NAP1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":110,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":115,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b6kh6","text":"Centrifuge the samples to pellet the beads and remove the unbound lysate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"frp5n","text":"Wash the beads twice with wash buffer, once with high salt wash buffer, and two more times with wash {"blocks":[{"key":"4gddm","text":"Incubate beads   at   with TEV protease (for unlabeled NAP1) or   of   reduced glutathione dissolved in wash buffer (for GST-NAP1).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":64,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"asmtv","text":"After the proteins were released from the beads, filter the GST-NAP1 protein through a   syringe filter, concentrated using a 30 kDa cut-off Amicon filter (Merck Millipore), or 10 kDa cut-off in case of unlabeled NAP1, and loaded onto a pre-equilibrated Superose 6 Increase 10/300 GL column (Cytiva).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":87,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":202,"value":"0.45"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dfdsj","text":"After concentrating the purified protein, aliquot the protein and snap-freeze in liquid nitrogen.
